# 安装部署
1. helm install --name kubernetes-dashboard stable/kubernetes-dashboard --namespace kube-system --version 1.10.0 -f values.yaml 

helm upgrade kubernetes-dashboard stable/kubernetes-dashboard --namespace kube-system --version 1.10.0 -f values.yaml

2. 记住 Token

kubectl -n kube-system describe secret $(kubectl -n kube-system get secret | grep kubernetes-dashboard | awk '{print $1}')

3. 只读 Token
kubectl -n kube-system describe secret $(kubectl -n kube-system get secret | grep read-user | awk '{print $1}')
